quotes.speaker: Ben Carter
quotes.quote: When I raise the same issues, I’m treated like I’m difficult, instead of them fixing the problem.

quotes.speaker: Emma Veritas
quotes.quote: That’s not how it should be, Ben. You have every right to raise issues.

quotes.speaker: Ben Carter
quotes.quote: But it is how it is. I get labelled instead of supported.

quotes.speaker: Emma Veritas
quotes.quote: I don’t label you, but I can see how it comes across when they don’t respond properly.

quotes.speaker: Ben Carter
quotes.quote: It’s not just how it comes across, it’s what’s happening. They’re rewriting what’s real.

quotes.speaker: Emma Veritas
quotes.quote: I understand. That’s why I keep pushing for clarity in writing.

contradictions.issue: Victim labelled difficult vs. advocate says not by her but concedes systemic misrepresentation

timeline_hooks.link: Evidence of gaslighting and erasure tactics
